title: Light Salad
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A take-out salad restaurant with a few stool seats. Could build your own salad. Lots of vegetable toppings, has fresh juices. Free Wi-Fi. Located near South Shaanxi, metro lines 1 and 10, exit 7; go west on Nanchang, then south on Xiangyang, it's on the west side of Xiangyang.
